Reviews.Title: Received what was expected
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: I purchased 4 of these to use with my defender cameras.  I have an 8 camera system.  I don't see any picture difference between the camera with and without the extension cables. I purchase mine for $10 each sold by amazon.com.  I noticed they are actually a little thicker than the ones that came with the cameras.  I will note that these are not direct extension cables.  They are the same type of cable that came with the cameras.  They have 2 male bnc connects and 1 male and 1 female dc power connector.  To use it as an extension you need to use the "included" BNC female to female coupler.  Looking back now I think I would have just purchased the 130' cable and used it instead of 2 65' connected to each other.  That way I didn't have to worry about it getting wet under my house.

Reviews.Title: GOOD CABLE
Reviews.Author: Pat L. Brooks
Reviews.Content: Works just fine with our SVAT Surveillance system.  What more can  you say about a cable? Needs four more words to accept.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Colin S.
Reviews.Content: Each individual cable came with a spool to organize the the cable. There is no need to purchase connectors as as each extension cable fits right into either the camera connector or other extension cables.  Quality is unaffected by using extension cables.

Reviews.Title: Works just fine
Reviews.Author: Marc Gothison
Reviews.Content: I'm pleased to write that I've had no issues with this cable at all.  Good, solid connectors and no appreciable degradation of either video or audio from the camera.

Reviews.Title: learn from my mistake
Reviews.Author: lmazza
Reviews.Content: Make sure you install this extension cable starting at the dvr then to the existing wire to camera. These wont connect to the camera the way they have the ends installed on them. Cable seems good quality and correct length.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Corey Jones
Reviews.Content: i ordered the wrong cord but i had the ends i needed so i just cut of the end and put mine on. made my cord 65 feet longer and hasnt missed a mintune of video since.

Reviews.Title: worked well with adapters
Reviews.Author: Isaiah
Reviews.Content: The BNC and Power connectors were backwards, had to buy more BNC converters, make sure to check your connections before you buy.

Reviews.Title: Cable does not fit existing system
Reviews.Author: Ken McLeod
Reviews.Content: When I tried to connect the camera using the extension cable, it could not be done.  The cable came with a male video and male power connection on one end and a female video and female power connection on the other end.  I could connect one end of the cable using the male adapters I had ordered but could not connect the other video end without a second (female) adapter which I did not have.To Amazon's credit they quickly authorized return of the cables and processed a refund including a portion of the expedited delivery fee.  This is the first time I have had to return anything to Amazon.  I will definitely continue to purchase items through them.If you are purchasing extension cables for your security camera system, double-check the fittings on the camera and existing cable before ordering the extension cables.

Reviews.Title: It Works
Reviews.Author: jonnii
Reviews.Content: It works fine. I use it to go around my house for the backyard camera. I did not want to go through the roof or drilling wholes through the house. It is long enough and the picture quality is still the same.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: E G.
Reviews.Content: Great value for security Camera cable.  Not the highest quality obviously but works great for home and office security systems.

Reviews.Title: It does what it is supposed to do.
Reviews.Author: Celestine Smart
Reviews.Content: I have read some negative reviews on this item but I did not find any. The cable works perfectly with little or no depreciation in the picture quality

Reviews.Title: These cables??
Reviews.Author: Heath Sims
Reviews.Content: These cables look great but they did not work. Made cameras so you could not view. But Defender gladly replaced them with new ones that work Great. I just sent them proof of purchase...

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Joloveshorses
Reviews.Content: Got this to go with the SVAT CV502-4CH-002 Web Ready 4 Channel H.264 500GB HDD DVR Security System with Smart Phone Access and 4 Indoor/Outdoor Hi-Res Night Vision CCD Surveillance Cameras.  Did the job in connecting the system.

Reviews.Title: Works Great...
Reviews.Author: J. P. "J.P."
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 of these cables to extend my current surveillance system.  I had 2 new cameras I wanted to add to my DVR but the standard 60 foot included cable was not going to reach the distance that I needed it to.  This cable worked perfectly with my current Defender cameras and provided great picture allowing me to reach the distance I needed to cover.One thing worth noting is that, in general, you don't want to have a cable run of longer than 180 feet.  Signal degrades over length no matter the quality of the cable and in my experience you can run 120 feet of cable with no noticeable quality loss but when you reach 180 and over the picture becomes more grainy and distorted.  Overall this is a good quality cable to match up with a current Defender camera system.

Reviews.Title: not as shown
Reviews.Author: bamboozled
Reviews.Content: Most of the video cables and the ones shown in the picture have two female BNC connectors. They sent me a male/female connector which would require a male to male BNC adapter to use. If you have not already strung your cables through the walls where you can start from the DVR with this cable your OK.  It must be the first cable, then use the female/female that came original.

Reviews.Title: sent me the wrong product 3times!!!
Reviews.Author: jay zheng
Reviews.Content: it is been a month already i just couldn't received the right cable for my camera!! amazon sent me the wrong cable THREE TIMES::  I still dont have the cable for my camera!! so disapointed!!!!

Reviews.Title: Wrong picture
Reviews.Author: A. Busca "Art"
Reviews.Content: You need a BNC male to male and a BNC female to female adapter. I had to spend an additional $15 on adapters ....

Reviews.Title: BNC male to BNC female
Reviews.Author: Keith Renn
Reviews.Content: The picture showed the cable to have two male BNC connectors but the two I ordered had one male and one female BNC. This is not what I wanted. Can't send one back because I had to change the connector to make it work.

Reviews.Title: Will NOT extend current wires without splicing
Reviews.Author: Greywey
Reviews.Content: I bought the kit that already had 65ft cables for each camera.  One camera was farther than 65ft from the DVR so I bought this to extend it.  The ends of this wire are not set up to extend, you will have to switch (by splicing) one end (red or yellow) with the other end to get this to extend existing wires.  I did get it to work, but did notice a slight drop in quality either due to the doubled length or my splicing.

Reviews.Title: Very bad cable
Reviews.Author: Coco
Reviews.Content: This cable is extremely thin and cheap. I bought it to work with my Sony CCD Camera. This horrible cable carries very blurry video image and lost signal. Picture is much fuzzier with significantly less clarity. I would NOT recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Masure the cable when you get it.
Reviews.Author: richard baxter
Reviews.Content: If you buy this product you had better measure the cable when you get it. They sent one to me that was twenty five feet instead of sixty five. The label said 65 feet from china. What do you expect from China. The land of defective, misleading, poison, junk.

ProductInfo.Features:
65 Feet Security Extension cables
Compatible with all Defender Security Camera
Black Color
ProductInfo.Name: Defender 21007 65-Feet Security Camera Extension Cable
